title: Finally...
body:
After nearly 1 and a half years of playing this game, both competitively and casually, after 200+ games of ranked, I finally climbed out of bronze and into Silver 5 this morning, and while I'm sure that it's only going to get harder from here, I wouldn't have it any other way.

I gotta admit, I feel better at the game already.

while yes the MMR/ELO is similar in bronze1 and silver 5, one very important detail people always forget is Promotion series.

Promos have a 45% win rate in every elo across the board, and its actully a lower percentage in the lower elos, for a few reasons:

1. Trolls, and childish behaviour
2. Jealousy from other players which then attempt to prevent you from winning. (gatekeeping)
3. lolnexus lets people know to focus you.

So yes while the mmr/elo is the same you have clearly shown that you can work as a team **under pressure**, carry a team **under pressure** and stay positive and win your games** under pressure.**

**you have earned silver rank**, you've displayed your ever growing knowledge of the game, and i'm sure it wont be too long before you are at your gold promos.
